passwordReset.title: Reset Your Password
passwordReset.subject: Reset your {appName} password
passwordReset.subtitle: Secure your account by creating a new password.
passwordReset.body: We received a request to reset your password for your {appName} account. This is a security measure to ensure your account remains protected.
passwordReset.securityNotice: Security Notice: This password reset link will expire in 1 hour for security reasons. If you didn't request this password reset, please ignore this email or contact our support team immediately.
passwordReset.help: If you have any questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to contact our support team.

passwordChanged.title: Password Changed
passwordChanged.subject: Your {appName} password has been changed
passwordChanged.subtitle: Your account password has been successfully changed.
passwordChanged.body: Your {appName} account password has been changed. This is an important security notification to keep you informed about changes to your account.
passwordChanged.securityNotice: If you didn't make these changes, please contact our support team immediately and consider changing your password.
passwordChanged.help: For additional security, consider enabling two-factor authentication in your account settings.

verifyEmail.title: Verify Your Email
verifyEmail.subject: Verify your email address
verifyEmail.subtitle: Complete your account setup by verifying your email address.
verifyEmail.body: Thank you for signing up with {appName}. To complete your account setup and start using our services, please verify your email address by clicking the button below.
verifyEmail.help: If you didn't create an account with {appName}, you can safely ignore this email.

loginAlert.title: New Login Detected
loginAlert.subject: New login to your {appName} account
loginAlert.subtitle: We detected a new login to your account.
loginAlert.body: We detected a new login to your {appName} account. This email contains details about the login for your security.
loginAlert.newDeviceWarning: ⚠️ This appears to be a new device or location. If this wasn't you, please secure your account immediately.
loginAlert.securityNotice: If you don't recognize this login, please change your password immediately and contact our support team. You can also review your recent login activity in your account settings.
loginAlert.help: For additional security, consider enabling two-factor authentication in your account settings.
